item.description: Join us at the new Rivals Bar & Grill.  They are looking forward to our visit and will be providing us with a delicious buffet to enjoy.  Come join us after work for a great time and mingle with old and new friends!  There is no charge.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 2095 Berlin Turnpike:  Take I‑91 S to Exit 28 to Berlin Turnpike (Rts. 5/15), facility on right next to Siesta Motel.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
